solution_line_template: For the chocolate cakes: Leila should pay: {price_chocolate} * {num_chocolate} = $<<{price_chocolate}*{num_chocolate}={chocolate_total}>>{chocolate_total}
For the strawberry cakes: Leila should pay: {price_strawberry} * {num_strawberry} = $<<{price_strawberry}*{num_strawberry}={strawberry_total}>>{strawberry_total}
Combining the chocolate cakes and strawberry cakes, Leila should pay: {chocolate_total} +{strawberry_total} = $<<{chocolate_total}+{strawberry_total}={total_payment}>>{total_payment}
